articles.title: Image to BMP converter
articles.description: If you've ever worked with embedded systems you know that showing information to the user is an important task, for that you can use an oled display but only showing text can be a little boring, to improve the appearance of your projects I made a script to convert a image or gif into a text file that contains bit information that you can pass to your favorite oled library
